dt.t: The equipment {phrase}carries a hefty price tag{/phrase}.

dt: {bc}to say how important or valuable something is
usually used in negative statements to say that something is extremely important and valuable

dt.t: You can't {it}put a price tag on{/it} the safety of our children.

shortdef: to say how important or valuable something is —usually used in negative statements to say that something is extremely important and valuable
